meanings.definition: A rod that transmits motion from a cam to a valve in an internal combustion engine.
meanings.sent1: The pushrod moved up and down to open and close the valve.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic adjusted the pushrod to ensure proper engine performance.
meanings.sent3: The pushrod decided to take a break from all the valve action.
meanings.sent4: The pushrod was like a messenger, delivering commands from the cam to the valve.
meanings.sent5: With each movement, the pushrod made the engine come alive.

meanings.definition: A rod used to push or operate a mechanism.
meanings.sent1: She used the pushrod to activate the machine.
meanings.sent2: The pushrod was essential in pushing the lever to start the engine.
meanings.sent3: The pushrod and the lever had a friendly competition on who could push harder.
meanings.sent4: In his hand, the pushrod felt like a powerful tool to control the mechanism.
meanings.sent5: Every push of the pushrod set the machinery in motion.
